name: DungeonSaga
0:
”Alexa open dungeon saga”
”Alexa launch dungeon saga”
”Alexa begin dungeon saga”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dungeon saga
des:
In this dungeon saga you are supposed to navigate the rooms and avoid the perils to survive until the end making best decisions.

To start, just say "Alexa, open dungeon saga" or "Alexa, launch dungeon saga" to start a game".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
